nodes.text: Waffle was a human male death trooper who served Grand Admiral Thrawn of the Seventh Fleet. He and Pik accompanied Imperial Military Department of Advanced Weapons Research Assistant Director Colonel Brierly Ronan and Lieutenant Eli Vanto of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet to the city Tiquwe on the planet Aloxor. Assistant Director Ronan did not know that Pik and Waffle were death troopers until mid way through the mission.
